   14: 
   15: """Type codes for MongoDB servers."""
   16: from __future__ import annotations
   17: 
   18: from typing import NamedTuple
   19: 
   20: 
   21: class _ServerType(NamedTuple):
   22:     Unknown: int
   23:     Mongos: int
   24:     RSPrimary: int
   25:     RSSecondary: int
   26:     RSArbiter: int
   27:     RSOther: int
   28:     RSGhost: int
   29:     Standalone: int
   30:     LoadBalancer: int
   31: 
   32: 
   33: SERVER_TYPE = _ServerType(*range(9))
